thread.title: Triple room is bigger than expected
thread.title_full: Triple room is bigger than expected - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: IreneOoi91
title: Triple room is bigger than expected
text: The room is quite big for 3 of us to open our 3 giant luggages without blocking our walkway. However the bed is small which is ok for us girls. The toilet is clean and bright. Considering it locates at quiet residential area and it is near to subway, very good location.
